comment.author: 18753752@N00
comment._content: Fisher was an artist who specialized in drawings of women: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harrison_Fisher

comment.author: 85016918@N00
comment._content: Fisher was an excellent illustrator - and one of the most popular American magazine illustrators of the pre-1910s and 1910s - his work was also published as series of postcards which proved extremely popular and are very collectible today.

comment._content: I absolutely love this portrait.  Super photographer!
